thought.text: Perfect! I can see that this test specifically tests the auto-transformation behavior. The user mentioned that they've already taken care of all changes to test files, so I don't need to modify this test. However, let me verify that our implementation is correct by creating a comprehensive test:

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
task_list.notes: Environment has build issues but we can proceed with exploration

task_list.title: Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
task_list.notes: Found the target code in astropy/table/table.py line 1244-1247 in _convert_data_to_col method

task_list.title: Phase 4: Create reproduction script
task_list.notes: Created mock reproduction script due to build issues

task_list.title: Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution
task_list.notes: Problem: auto-transformation of structured arrays to NdarrayMixin. Solution: Add FutureWarning before transformation

task_list.title: Phase 6: Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Added FutureWarning with clear message before auto-transformation in _convert_data_to_col method
